snippet.title: Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island - Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Grip Digital, the team behind the sci-fi exploration game The Solus Project, and developer Right Nice Games, have unveiled today 'Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island', a single-player action-platformer game. Headed to Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and PC later in 2016, Skylar & Plux: Adventure on Clover Island embraces a colorful, vibrant world of 3D platforming seemingly forgotten in today’s cluttered world of MOBAs and Survival games.

Official website: http://adventureoncloverisland.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skylarandplux
Twitter: https://twitter.com/skylarandplux

Grip Digital website: http://www.grip-digital.com/
Grip Digital Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Grip-Digital...
Grip Digital Twitter: https://twitter.com/grip_digital
